segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, reaching for the cookie jar like it's the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching so high, and the stool looks like it's about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how focused he is on those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little sister is right there, waiting for him to share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he's going to fall any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool legs are splayed out, and it looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if he's ever fallen like this before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful, like she's waiting for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the open cabinet doors framing him, almost like a stage for his daring act.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should tell him to be careful, but he seems determined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is so full of anticipation and risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he gets down safely and doesn't hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR
